links.*: Alphabet of Fëanor: Numenian, or Westron, Mode

wikitext.*:
[[Image:Esse nuquerna.gif|left]]'''''Áre Nuquerna''''' is the name in [[Quenya]] of the thirty-second letter of the [[Tengwar]] alphabet.<ref>{{App|Letters}}, Note, ''The names of the letters''</ref>  In form it is the thirty-first letter ([[Áre]]) inverted.  It is mostly used as a variation, especially in modes employing superimposed ''[[tehtar]]'',<ref>{{App|Letters}}, Note, ''The additional letters''</ref> and it represents '''Z'''.  The Westron name for this letter is '''''Oza'''''.<ref>See ''[[Alphabet of Fëanor: Numenian, or Westron, Mode]]''</ref>
